00051 namespace {
00052   struct reverse_sort_clfi {
00053     bool operator()(const CommitLogFileInfo &clfi1, const CommitLogFileInfo &clfi2) const {
00054       return clfi1.num >= clfi2.num;
00055     }
00056   };
00057 }

00062 CommitLogReader::CommitLogReader(Filesystem *fs, String log_dir) : CommitLogBase(log_dir), m_fs(fs), m_block_buffer(256), m_compressor(0) {
00063   load_fragments(log_dir);
00064 }

00072 bool CommitLogReader::next_raw_block(CommitLogBlockInfo *infop, BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog *header) {
00073 
00074  try_again:
00075 
00076   if (m_fragment_stack.empty())
00077     return false;
00078 
00079   if (m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream == 0)
00080     m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream = new CommitLogBlockStream(m_fs, m_fragment_stack.top().log_dir, format("%u", m_fragment_stack.top().num) );
00081 
00082   if (!m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream->next(infop, header)) {
00083     delete m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream;
00084     m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream = 0;
00085     m_fragment_queue.push_back( m_fragment_stack.top() );
00086     m_fragment_stack.pop();
00087     goto try_again;
00088   }
00089 
00090   return true;
00091 }

00095 bool CommitLogReader::next(const uint8_t **blockp, size_t *lenp, BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog *header) {
00096   int error;
00097   CommitLogBlockInfo binfo;
00098 
00099   while (next_raw_block(&binfo, header)) {
00100 
00101     if (binfo.error == Error::OK) {
00102       DynamicBuffer zblock(0);
00103 
00104       m_block_buffer.clear();
00105       zblock.base = binfo.block_ptr;
00106       zblock.ptr = binfo.block_ptr + binfo.block_len;
00107 
00108       load_compressor(header->get_compression_type());
00109 
00110       // Decompress
00111       if ((error = m_compressor->inflate(zblock, m_block_buffer, *header)) != Error::OK) {
00112         HT_ERRORF("Inflate error in CommitLog fragment %s starting at postion %lld (block len = %lld) - %s",
00113                   m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream->get_fname().c_str(),
00114                   binfo.start_offset, binfo.end_offset - binfo.start_offset,
00115                   Error::get_text(error));
00116         continue;
00117       }
00118  
00119       zblock.release();
00120       *blockp = m_block_buffer.base;
00121       *lenp = m_block_buffer.fill();
00122       HT_INFOF("shaggy\t%s\t%u\t%u", m_log_name.c_str(), header->get_data_checksum(), header->get_data_zlength());
00123       return true;
00124     }
00125 
00126     HT_ERRORF("Corruption detected in CommitLog fragment %s starting at postion %lld for %lld bytes - %s",
00127               m_fragment_stack.top().block_stream->get_fname().c_str(),
00128               binfo.start_offset, binfo.end_offset - binfo.start_offset,
00129               Error::get_text(binfo.error));
00130   }
00131 
00132   return false;
00133 }

00137 void CommitLogReader::load_fragments(String &log_dir) {
00138   vector<string> listing;
00139   CommitLogFileInfo file_info;
00140   vector<CommitLogFileInfo> fragment_vector;
00141   struct reverse_sort_clfi fragment_ordering_obj;
00142 
00143   FileUtils::add_trailing_slash( log_dir );
00144   
00145   m_fs->readdir(log_dir, listing);
00146 
00147   if (listing.size() == 0)
00148     return;
00149 
00150   for (size_t i=0; i<listing.size(); i++) {
00151     char *endptr;
00152     long num = strtol(listing[i].c_str(), &endptr, 10);
00153     if (*endptr != 0) {
00154       HT_WARNF("Invalid file '%s' found in commit log directory '%s'", listing[i].c_str(), log_dir.c_str());
00155     }
00156     else {
00157       file_info.num = (uint32_t)num;
00158       file_info.log_dir = log_dir;
00159       file_info.purge_log_dir = false;
00160       file_info.timestamp = 0;
00161       file_info.block_stream = 0;
00162       file_info.size = m_fs->length(log_dir + listing[i]);
00163       fragment_vector.push_back(file_info);
00164     }
00165   }
00166 
00167   sort(fragment_vector.begin(), fragment_vector.end(), fragment_ordering_obj);
00168 
00169   // set the "purge log dir" bit on the most recent fragment
00170   fragment_vector[0].purge_log_dir = true;
00171 
00172   for (size_t i=0; i<fragment_vector.size(); i++)
00173     m_fragment_stack.push(fragment_vector[i]);
00174 
00175 }

00177 
00178 void CommitLogReader::load_compressor(uint16_t ztype) {
00179   BlockCompressionCodecPtr compressor_ptr;
00180 
00181   if (m_compressor != 0 && ztype == m_compressor_type)
00182     return;
00183   if (ztype >= BlockCompressionCodec::COMPRESSION_TYPE_LIMIT)
00184     throw Hypertable::Exception(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_UNSUPPORTED_TYPE, (String)"Invalid compression type - " + ztype);
00185 
00186   compressor_ptr = m_compressor_map[ztype];
00187 
00188   if (!compressor_ptr) {
00189     compressor_ptr = CompressorFactory::create_block_codec((BlockCompressionCodec::Type)ztype);
00190     m_compressor_map[ztype] = compressor_ptr;
00191   }
00192 
00193   m_compressor_type = ztype;
00194   m_compressor = compressor_ptr.get();
00195 }
